text: The IV Velká Cena Masarykova (1933 Masaryk Grand Prix, V Masarykův okruh) was a 750 kg Formula race held on 17 September 1933 at the Masaryk Circuit.http://www.kolumbus.fi/leif.snellman/gp3315.htm#66 All layouts of the Masaryk Circuit (Brno Circuit) between 1930 and today combined ==Classification== {| border="2" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 0; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font- size: 95%;" !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Pos !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| No !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Driver !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Team !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Car !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Laps !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Time/Retired !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Grid !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Points |- ! 1 | 2 | Louis Chiron | Scuderia Ferrari | Alfa Romeo Tipo B/P3 | 17 | 4:50:22.8 | 1 | |- ! 2 | 34 | Luigi Fagioli | Scuderia Ferrari | Alfa Romeo Tipo B/P3 | 17 | +3:38.0 | 14 | |- ! 3 | 26 | Jean-Pierre Wimille | R.
